title: Fitness Equipment Installer / Technician
description: Join our family-owned, veteran-operated team as a fitness equipment installer and technician. Work with all major fitness equipment brands including Matrix, Life Fitness, Precor, Technogym, and more.
responsibilities: Install fitness equipment at commercial and residential locations
Disassemble and reassemble equipment for moves
Provide excellent customer service to all clients
Maintain tools and company vehicle in good condition
requirements: Physically fit - ability to lift 50+ lbs regularly
Valid driver's license and clean driving record
Professional demeanor and strong work ethic
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Prior experience with fitness equipment or installation preferred but not required
